wikitext.*:
'''NGWAW''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "howl".<ref name=PE19>{{PE|19}}, pp. 106-107</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[nauro]]'' ("[[werewolves]]");<ref name=PE19/> ''naule'' (wolf-howl")<ref name=LR/>
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[gaur]]'' ("werewolf");<ref name=PE19/> ''gaul'' ("wolf-howl"); ''gaw-'' ("howl"); ''gawad'' ("howling")<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 377)</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==

In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']] appears the root ÑGAW, signifying "howl".<ref name=LR/>

==See also==

*[[ÑGAW]]
